CustomField.description: Indicates whether line item is meeting the suggested sales discount guidelines as part of catalyst functionality
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Suggested_Sales_Discount_Percentage__c)), IF(Suggested_Sales_Discount_Percentage__c = 'NA','NA' ,IF( Sales_Discount_Deviation_Percentage__c <= 0 , IMAGE("/resource/1555062746000/Guidelines_Color_Green", "Green", 18, 18),IF(Sales_Discount_Deviation_Percentage__c > 0 && Sales_Discount_Deviation_Percentage__c <= $CustomMetadata.Discount_Guidelines_Deviation__mdt.Yellow.Discount_Deviation_Limit__c, IMAGE("/resource/1555062862000/Guidelines_Color_Yellow", "Yellow", 18, 18),IF(Sales_Discount_Deviation_Percentage__c > $CustomMetadata.Discount_Guidelines_Deviation__mdt.Yellow.Discount_Deviation_Limit__c && Sales_Discount_Deviation_Percentage__c <= $CustomMetadata.Discount_Guidelines_Deviation__mdt.Orange.Discount_Deviation_Limit__c , IMAGE("/resource/1555062797000/Guidelines_Color_Orange", "Orange", 18, 18) , IMAGE("/resource/1555062829000/Guidelines_Color_Red", "Red", 18, 18)) )) ), IMAGE("/resource/1555062699000/Guidelines_Color_Grey", "Grey", 18, 18))
CustomField.label: Meets Discount Guidelines
